news.title: Dropkick Murphys rip into Trump with 'First Class Loser' dedication
news.summary: "Punk rock and Donald Trump just don't belong together," the band posted last week.

news.title: Fans gather for Ozzy Osbourne's funeral in Birmingham
news.summary: A livestreamed procession will make its way through Birmingham city today ahead of Osbourne's private funeral

news.title: Warmduscher announce Really Good Time as special guests for upcomingÂ Dublin show
Original Iron Maiden vocalist Paul Mario Day dies aged 69
news.summary: His death occurred on July 29 at his home in Australia, following his battle with cancer, and was confirmed by his band MORE

news.title: David Gilmour announces new concert film and album
news.summary: His new single can be heard below.

news.title: Edel Murphy: "I owe it to the music, the artists and the women in the stories to do it justice and take it seriously"
news.summary: Following the release of her superb album Motherland Songs, singer-songwriter Edel Murphy discusses covering iconic tracks from the last century, centring women's perspectives, and connecting people through music.
